text.p: True or false: If [mathjaxinline]S[/mathjaxinline] is the solution set to [mathjaxinline]Ax = \mathbf{0}[/mathjaxinline], then the solution set to [mathjaxinline]Ax = v[/mathjaxinline] must be a translation of [mathjaxinline]S[/mathjaxinline].

font.p: If the solution set to [mathjaxinline]Ax = v[/mathjaxinline] is empty (i.e. if [mathjaxinline]v[/mathjaxinline] is not a linear combination of the columns of [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline]), then it can't be a translation of [mathjaxinline]S[/mathjaxinline], which is sure to contain at least one solution (the zero vector).
If [mathjaxinline]Ax = v[/mathjaxinline] is consistent, then the solution set will be a translation of [mathjaxinline]S[/mathjaxinline].
